title: build(deps): bump axios from 1.8.2 to 1.12.0 in /packages/web
body:
Bumps [axios](https://github.com/axios/axios) from 1.8.2 to 1.12.0.
Release notes

Sourced from axios's releases.

Release v1.12.0

Release notes:

Bug Fixes

  • adding build artifacts (9ec86de)
  • dont add dist on release (a2edc36)
  • fetch-adapter: set correct Content-Type for Node FormData (#6998) (a9f47af)
  • node: enforce maxContentLength for data: URLs (#7011) (945435f)
  • package exports (#5627) (aa78ac2)
  • params: removing '[' and ']' from URL encode exclude characters (#3316) (#5715) (6d84189)
  • release pr run (fd7f404)
  • types: change the type guard on isCancel (#5595) (0dbb7fd)

Features

  • adapter: surface low‚Äëlevel network error details; attach original error via cause (#6982) (78b290c)
  • fetch: add fetch, Request, Response env config variables for the adapter; (#7003) (c959ff2)
  • support reviver on JSON.parse (#5926) (2a97634), closes #5924
  • types: extend AxiosResponse interface to include custom headers type (#6782) (7960d34)

Contributors to this release

  • Willian Agostini
  • Dmitriy Mozgovoy
  • khani
  • Ameer Assadi
  • Emiedonmokumo Dick-Boro
  • Zeroday BYTE
  • Jason Saayman
  • ÏµúÏòàÏ∞¨
  • Gligor Kotushevski
  • Aleksandar Dimitrov

Release v1.11.0

Release notes:

Bug Fixes

  • form-data npm pakcage (#6970) (e72c193)
  • prevent RangeError when using large Buffers (#6961) (a2214ca)
  • types: resolve type discrepancies between ESM and CJS TypeScript declaration files (#6956) (8517aa1)

Contributors to this release

  • izzy goldman
  • Manish Sahani
  • Noritaka Kobayashi
  • James Nail
  • Tejaswi1305

... (truncated)

Changelog

Sourced from axios's changelog.

1.12.0 (2025-09-11)

Bug Fixes

  • adding build artifacts (9ec86de)
  • dont add dist on release (a2edc36)
  • fetch-adapter: set correct Content-Type for Node FormData (#6998) (a9f47af)
  • node: enforce maxContentLength for data: URLs (#7011) (945435f)
  • package exports (#5627) (aa78ac2)
  • params: removing '[' and ']' from URL encode exclude characters (#3316) (#5715) (6d84189)
  • release pr run (fd7f404)
  • types: change the type guard on isCancel (#5595) (0dbb7fd)

Features

  • adapter: surface low‚Äëlevel network error details; attach original error via cause (#6982) (78b290c)
  • fetch: add fetch, Request, Response env config variables for the adapter; (#7003) (c959ff2)
  • support reviver on JSON.parse (#5926) (2a97634), closes #5924
  • types: extend AxiosResponse interface to include custom headers type (#6782) (7960d34)

Contributors to this release

  • Willian Agostini
  • Dmitriy Mozgovoy
  • khani
  • Ameer Assadi
  • Emiedonmokumo Dick-Boro
  • Zeroday BYTE
  • Jason Saayman
  • ÏµúÏòàÏ∞¨
  • Gligor Kotushevski
  • Aleksandar Dimitrov

1.11.0 (2025-07-22)

Bug Fixes

  • form-data npm pakcage (#6970) (e72c193)
  • prevent RangeError when using large Buffers (#6961) (a2214ca)
  • types: resolve type discrepancies between ESM and CJS TypeScript declaration files (#6956) (8517aa1)

Contributors to this release

  • izzy goldman
  • Manish Sahani
  • Noritaka Kobayashi
  • James Nail

... (truncated)

Commits
  • 0d8ad6e chore(release): v1.12.0 (#7013)
  • fd7f404 fix: release pr run
  • a2edc36 fix: dont add dist on release
  • 9ec86de fix: adding build artifacts
  • 945435f fix(node): enforce maxContentLength for data: URLs (#7011)
  • 28e5e30 chore(sponsor): update sponsor block (#7005)
  • d03f245 chore(CI): fixed release info script to use npm registry instead of git as fi...
  • a0bc911 chore: removing dist files from src (#7002)
  • c959ff2 feat(fetch): add fetch, Request, Response env config variables for the adapte...
  • a9f47af fix(fetch-adapter): set correct Content-Type for Node FormData (#6998)
  • Additional commits viewable in compare view

You can also trigger a rebase manually by commenting `@dependabot rebase`. [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-start) [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-end) ---
Dependabot commands and options
You can trigger Dependabot actions by commenting on this PR: - `@dependabot rebase` will rebase this PR - `@dependabot recreate` will recreate this PR, overwriting any edits that have been made to it - `@dependabot merge` will merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot squash and merge` will squash and merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot cancel merge` will cancel a previously requested merge and block automerging - `@dependabot reopen` will reopen this PR if it is closed - `@dependabot close` will close this PR and stop Dependabot recreating it. You can achieve the same result by closing it manually - `@dependabot show ignore conditions` will show all of the ignore conditions of the specified dependency - `@dependabot ignore this major version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this major version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this minor version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this minor version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this dependency` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this dependency (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) You can disable automated security fix PRs for this repo from the [Security Alerts page](https://github.com/KarinJS/Karin/network/alerts).

title: refactor: plugins
body:

ÂÖ®Èù¢ÊîπËøõ‰∫ÜÊ†∏ÂøÉÊèí‰ª∂Ê°ÜÊû∂ÔºåÈÄöËøáÂºïÂÖ•ÈõÜ‰∏≠ÂºèÊèí‰ª∂ÁÆ°ÁêÜÂô®ÂíåÊ≥®ÂÜåÊ®°ÂùóÔºåÂ∞ÜÊèí‰ª∂ APIÔºàÂëΩ‰ª§„ÄÅÊé•Âèó„ÄÅÊåâÈíÆ„ÄÅ‰ªªÂä°„ÄÅÂ§ÑÁêÜÁ®ãÂ∫èÂíåÁ±ªÊ†∑ÂºèÔºâÁªü‰∏Ä‰∏∫Â∏¶ÊúâÊéßÂà∂Êé•Âè£ÁöÑËØ¶ÁªÜÁºìÂ≠òÂØπË±°ÔºåÂπ∂Â∞ÜÂ∏∏ËßÅÁöÑ‰∫ã‰ª∂Â§ÑÁêÜ„ÄÅËøáÊª§„ÄÅÂÜ∑Âç¥„ÄÅÊùÉÈôêÂíåÂàÜÂèëÈÄªËæëÊèêÂèñÂà∞ÂèØÈáçÁî®Â∑•ÂÖ∑‰∏≠„ÄÇÊ∑ªÂä†‰∫ÜÁÉ≠ÈáçËΩΩÊîØÊåÅÂíåÁî®‰∫éÂä®ÊÄÅÊñá‰ª∂ globbing ÁöÑÊñ∞ `@karin/glob` ÂåÖ„ÄÇÊõ¥Êñ∞‰∫ÜÊúçÂä°Âô®Êèí‰ª∂Á´ØÁÇπÔºåÊï¥Âêà‰∫ÜÈÅóÁïô‰ª£Á†ÅÔºåÁé∞‰ª£Âåñ‰∫Ü Vite ÊûÑÂª∫ÈÖçÁΩÆÔºåÂπ∂ÊèêÂçá‰∫ÜÈ°πÁõÆ‰æùËµñ„ÄÇ

Êñ∞ÁâπÊÄßÔºö
- Ê∑ªÂä†‰∫Ü `@karin/glob` ÂåÖÔºåÂåÖÂê´ `importGlob` Âíå `importGlobEager`ÔºåÁî®‰∫éÂä®ÊÄÅÊñá‰ª∂Âä†ËΩΩÂíåÂéüÂßãÂÜÖÂÆπÊîØÊåÅ
- ‰∏∫Âü∫‰∫éÂëΩ‰ª§„ÄÅÊé•Âèó„ÄÅÊåâÈíÆ„ÄÅ‰ªªÂä°„ÄÅÂ§ÑÁêÜÁ®ãÂ∫èÂíåÁ±ªÁöÑÊèí‰ª∂ÂÆûÁé∞‰∫ÜÈõÜ‰∏≠ÂºèÊèí‰ª∂ÁÆ°ÁêÜÂô®ÂíåÊ≥®ÂÜåÊ®°Âùó
- ÈÄöËøá `core/karin/class.ts` ÂºïÂÖ•‰∫ÜÂü∫‰∫éÁ±ªÁöÑÊèí‰ª∂ÊîØÊåÅ
- Âú® `event/utils` ‰∏ãÊ∑ªÂä†‰∫ÜÁªü‰∏ÄÁöÑ‰∫ã‰ª∂Â∑•ÂÖ∑Ôºà`filter`„ÄÅ`cooldown`„ÄÅ`checker`„ÄÅ`permission`„ÄÅ`initializer`„ÄÅ`dispatch` Âíå `logger`Ôºâ
- Ê∑ªÂä†‰∫ÜÁÉ≠ÈáçËΩΩÂáΩÊï∞ `reloadApp` Âíå `reloadPackage`ÔºåÁî®‰∫éÂÆûÊó∂Êèí‰ª∂Êõ¥Êñ∞

ÊîπËøõÔºö
- ÈáçÊûÑ‰∫ÜÊâÄÊúâÊ∂àÊÅØ„ÄÅÈÄöÁü•ÂíåËØ∑Ê±ÇÂ§ÑÁêÜÁ®ãÂ∫èÔºå‰ª•‰ΩøÁî®ÂÖ±‰∫´ÁöÑ `handleMessageCommon` Âíå `dispatch` Â∑•ÂÖ∑
- ÈáçÊñ∞ËÆæËÆ°‰∫ÜÊ†∏ÂøÉ Karin APIÔºå‰ª•ËøîÂõûÂ∏¶ÊúâÊµÅÁïÖÊéßÂà∂Êé•Âè£ÁöÑ‰∏∞ÂØåÊèí‰ª∂ÁºìÂ≠òÂØπË±°
- Êõ¥Êñ∞‰∫ÜÊúçÂä°Âô®Êèí‰ª∂Á´ØÁÇπÂíåÁ±ªÂûãÔºå‰ª•‰∏éÊñ∞ÁöÑÊèí‰ª∂ÁºìÂ≠òÂíåÁÆ°ÁêÜÂô®ÈõÜÊàê
- ÈÄöËøáÂ∞Ü `manualChunks` ËøÅÁßªÂà∞ `advancedChunks` Âπ∂Ë∞ÉÊï¥ÂéãÁº©ÂíåÂëΩÂêçËÆæÁΩÆÊù•ÁÆÄÂåñ Vite ÊûÑÂª∫ÈÖçÁΩÆ
- Âà†Èô§‰∫ÜÈÅóÁïôÁöÑÂÜÖËÅîÂ§ÑÁêÜÁ®ãÂ∫èÈÄªËæëÔºåÂπ∂Êï¥ÂêàÂà∞Êñ∞ÁöÑÂ∑•ÂÖ∑È©±Âä®ÁªìÊûÑ‰∏≠

ÊûÑÂª∫Ôºö
- Êõ¥Êñ∞‰∫Ü `devDependencies` ÁâàÊú¨Âπ∂Ê∑ªÂä†‰∫ÜÁº∫Â∞ëÁöÑ‰æùËµñÈ°πÔºåÂ¶Ç `glob`

ÊñáÊ°£Ôºö
- ‰∏∫ `@karin/glob` ÂåÖÊ∑ªÂä†‰∫Ü `README.md` ÊñáÊ°£

<details>
<summary>Original summary in English</summary>

## Summary by Sourcery

Overhaul the core plugin framework by introducing a centralized plugin manager and register modules, unifying plugin APIs (command, accept, button, task, handler, and class styles) into detailed cache objects with control interfaces, and extracting common event handling, filtering, cooldown, permission, and dispatch logic into reusable utilities. Add hot-reload support and a new @karin/glob package for dynamic file globbing. Update server plugin endpoints, consolidate legacy code, modernize Vite build configuration, and bump project dependencies.

New Features:
- Add @karin/glob package with importGlob and importGlobEager for dynamic file loading and raw content support
- Implement centralized plugin manager and register modules for command, accept, button, task, handler, and class-based plugins
- Introduce class-based plugin support via core/karin/class.ts
- Add unified event utilities (filter, cooldown, checker, permission, initializer, dispatch, and logger) under event/utils
- Add hot-reload functions reloadApp and reloadPackage for live plugin updates

Enhancements:
- Refactor all message, notice, and request handlers to use shared handleMessageCommon and dispatch utilities
- Redesign core Karin APIs to return rich plugin cache objects with fluent control interfaces
- Update server plugin endpoints and types to integrate with the new plugin cache and manager
- Simplify Vite build configuration by migrating manualChunks to advancedChunks and adjusting compression and naming settings
- Remove legacy inline handler logic and consolidate into the new utility-driven structure

Build:
- Update devDependencies versions and add missing dependencies like glob

Documentation:
- Add README.md documentation for @karin/glob package

</details>
